channel.title: Need a Development Team/Partner (Someone Who is Good With Java!)
channel.description:
I am looking for another person to start up a very successful server with. I can cover most of the things required for starting a server, but I need someone who is very good with Java. Here are all the things I can handle:
[ul][li]Website Development on a Professional Level (I've done it professionally for six years, can do just about ANYTHING.)[/li] [li]Networking and Managing The Server (This includes setting up and maintaining the VPS and other networking features.)[/li] [li]Wonderful Ideas (Throughout my whole life, I've been told I have great ideas, I have tons of ideas I'm wanting to try for a RSPS, I just need someone to do the Java part and partner up with me.)[/li] [li]Some Java Knowledge (I know how the RSPS servers work and the structure on which they're built. I know minimal things primarily pertaining to SQL and JDBC drivers for Java. I can also efficiently make a server run from SQL databases.)[/li] [li]Graphical Design (I am a Website Developer, but also a Website Designer, yes, there is a difference. I even go to the extent to physically draw images, scan them, and enhance them with a computer, to use for some of my websites.)[/li][/ul]
I have lots of good skills, I just need someone who is good with Java, we will make an amazing team. Let me know if you're good with Java and leadership, all profits, and control is split evenly, neither of us will have more power over the other. I find that the best way to have a successful server is to have a staff team that can work together, efficiently, and successfully.

item.title: Need a Development Team/Partner (Someone Who is Good With Java!)
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

I’m great with getting players and running servers, but I don’t have the funds for a vps or webhost atm. If you’re willing to work with me that’d be cool.

Read full topic
item.source: Need a Development Team/Partner (Someone Who is Good With Java!)

item.title: Need a Development Team/Partner (Someone Who is Good With Java!)

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Good luck in your search and message me when the project starts. I’d love to alpha/beta like I did on one a while back if I remember right.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a Development Team/Partner (Someone Who is Good With Java!)
item.dc:creator: @The_Web_Guy The Web Guy
item.description:
@The_Web_Guy wrote:

I am looking for another person to start up a very successful server with. I can cover most of the things required for starting a server, but I need someone who is very good with Java. Here are all the things I can handle:

[ul][li]Website Development on a Professional Level (I’ve done it professionally for six years, can do just about ANYTHING.)[/li]
[li]Networking and Managing The Server (This includes setting up and maintaining the VPS and other networking features.)[/li]
[li]Wonderful Ideas (Throughout my whole life, I’ve been told I have great ideas, I have tons of ideas I’m wanting to try for a RSPS, I just need someone to do the Java part and partner up with me.)[/li]
[li]Some Java Knowledge (I know how the RSPS servers work and the structure on which they’re built. I know minimal things primarily pertaining to SQL and JDBC drivers for Java. I can also efficiently make a server run from SQL databases.)[/li]
[li]Graphical Design (I am a Website Developer, but also a Website Designer, yes, there is a difference. I even go to the extent to physically draw images, scan them, and enhance them with a computer, to use for some of my websites.)[/li][/ul]

I have lots of good skills, I just need someone who is good with Java, we will make an amazing team. Let me know if you’re good with Java and leadership, all profits, and control is split evenly, neither of us will have more power over the other. I find that the best way to have a successful server is to have a staff team that can work together, efficiently, and successfully.
